pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - SolitudeSprings SolitudeSprings Home About Us Casino Contact Your Privacy Matters Welcome to SolitudeSprings Thanks for visiting SolitudeSprings! We take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we handle your information when you use our website or related platforms (collectively, the "Site"). If you're not comfortable with these terms, please don't use the Site. What We Collect We collect info to give you a smooth and personalized experience. This may include things like: Basic Info (like name and email) Usage Data (how you interact with the Site) Device Info (type of device you use) Info from Third Parties (if you use social logins) How We Use Your Info We use your information to make the Site better for you. This may involve: Running contests and promotions. Responding to legal requests. Managing your account. Sending you updates and targeted offers (with your permission). Sharing Your Info We only share your information in specific situations, such as: When required by law. With trusted partners who help us run the Site. For marketing (but only with your consent). Keeping Your Info Safe We use strong security measures to protect your information. However, no system is foolproof, so we recommend staying vigilant online. Changes to This Policy We may update this policy occasionally. We'll notify you of any significant changes. The SolitudeSprings website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
